forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 47. West southwest wind around 2 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. North northwest wind 2 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
In the still of the night, San Francisco lays shrouded in a blanket of soft clouds, whispering promises of a new day. The air carries a coolness, hinting at the chill that will soon dissipate into the morning. As dawn approaches, the city prepares for a turn; a spell of sunshine beckons, gently clearing the lingering clouds, yet the crispness of the early hours holds tightly to the freshness of impending warmth.

Saturday unveils itself with mostly sunny skies, as the sun ascends to touch the vibrant urban landscape, illuminating the intricate architecture and the rolling greenery dotting the hills. The high temperature hovers around a comfortable 63 degrees, inviting residents and wanderers alike to step out into the city's embrace. As the afternoon unfolds, expect a slight dip to around 59, perfect for a leisurely stroll or an afternoon sit in one of the many cafes that adorn the streets. The north-northwest breeze adds a subtle hint of motion to the air, gentle enough to encourage exploration without pulling away warmth.

Dressing in layers will serve well – a light jacket or cardigan should accompany you, easily shed when the sun's embrace calls for a more casual attire. With the visibility improving and hints of fog dissipating, one might relish a walk along the waterfront, perhaps pausing to capture the golden light on the bay or indulging in the simple pleasure of people-watching in a cozy park. Whether it's a quiet morning coffee or an afternoon chat with friends, today unfolds with promise—an invitation to savor the nuanced beauty that only San Francisco can offer.
